meanings.sent1: The company's underinvestments led to its downfall.
meanings.sent2: The underinvestments in education have resulted in a lack of resources for students.
meanings.sent3: The underinvestments in the amusement park made it more of a bore park!
meanings.sent4: Her underinvestments in relationships left her feeling lonely and isolated.
meanings.sent5: The underinvestments in the infrastructure were like planting seeds in barren soil.

meanings.definition: The act of investing too little.
meanings.sent1: Government underinvestments can have long-lasting negative effects on society.
meanings.sent2: His underinvestments in his health eventually caught up with him.
meanings.sent3: The underinvestments in the cookie jar mysteriously disappeared overnight!
meanings.sent4: Their underinvestments in the project caused it to crumble like a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The underinvestments in the team were evident when they lost every game in the season.
